=============
API Reference
=============

The core of ``matryoshka`` is the ``emulator`` module:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   api/emulator

``matryoshka`` also has modules to assist in making predictions of observables with the component emulators:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   api/halomodel
   api/eftfuncs
   api/rsd


``matryoshka`` also includes some convenience functions for re-training component emulators and producing some plots.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   api/training_funcs
   api/plot
